title: Navigating Chaos through Inspiration: Sandra Wright Shen, Classical Pianist
description:
Sandra Wright Shen is an amazingly gifted concert pianist who teaches at the San Francisco Conservatory of Music (pre-college), has private students, and has developed a concert series that she has performed world-wide which showcases the faith walk and struggles of noted classical composers.

Sandra tells the inspiration for the concert series, talks about her childhood and the life experiences, the sorrows and the joys that animate her love for Christ and her passion for reaching others with music.

Sandra's performance that was highlighted here begins at 15:00 on this video:  https://youtu.be/G3coDGVtADc?t=900
